name: tapword-translator
description: A smart AI-powered translation browser extension that provides context-aware translations

scripts.dev: npm run prebuild:dev && vite -c vite.config.ts --mode development
scripts.dev:firefox: npm run prebuild:dev && vite -c vite.config.ts --mode firefox
scripts.dev:prod: npm run prebuild:prod && vite -c vite.config.ts --mode production
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run prebuild:dev && vite build -c vite.config.ts --mode development
scripts.build:firefox: npm run clean && npm run prebuild:prod && NODE_ENV=production vite build -c vite.config.ts --mode firefox
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run prebuild:prod && NODE_ENV=production vite build -c vite.config.ts --mode production
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && node scripts/package-with-version.mjs firefox
scripts.package:community: npm run build:community && node scripts/package-with-version.mjs community
scripts.dev:community: npm run prebuild:community && vite -c vite.config.ts --mode community
scripts.build:community: npm run clean && npm run prebuild:community && NODE_ENV=production vite build -c vite.config.ts --mode community
